altTitles.th: เลือกสาวเบอร์ 101 เป็นราชินีสิ

description.en:
In the world I was reborn into, the Crown Princess is chosen through nominating candidates. I'm just an average extra, so it has nothing to do with me… but then why have I become a candidate for the title of Crown Princess?

"I, Evie Collins, am the 101ˢᵗ Nominee to become the Crown Princess!"

There are a total of 101 candidates, who will be chosen by the prince?

---
Reborn as the daughter of a humble family in the countryside, Evie Collins has settled into a quiet and uneventful life in the boonies. Everything changes when she becomes the sole commoner up against 100 noble ladies to marry Crown Prince Ikasha, one of the most powerful rulers in the world. But rumors say his face is horribly disfigured, always hidden behind a mask. Is that why his marriage is up to this most unusual contest? Can Evie hold her own against the field of haughty aristocrats and unravel the mysteries of the man behind the mask? Based on the hit novel.

---
In the reborn world, the Crown Princess is voted for. I'm a very normal extra, so it's nothing to do with me.... but why did I become a candidate for the Crown Princess?

---

description.th:
ณ ต่างโลกที่ฉันเกิดใหม่มีการคัดเลือกราชินี... มีหญิงสาวหลายคนสมัครไป ตอนแรกฉันนึกว่าเรื่องนี้จะไม่เกี่ยวข้องกับสามัญชนอย่างฉัน แต่ทำไมอยู่ดีๆ ฉันได้ถูกเลือกเป็นหนึ่งในผู้สมัคร 101 คนล่ะ? “สวัสดีค่ะ ฉัน Ibbie Collins ผู้สมัครเบอร์ 101 ในการแข่งขันชิงตำแหน่งราชินีนะคะ”

description.tr:
Reenkarne olduğum dünyada Veliaht Prenses adaylar arasından seçiliyor. Ben sadece bir fazlalığım, yani benimle alakası yok… fakat o zaman neden Veliaht Prenses unvanı için aday oldum ki? “Ben, Evie Collins Veliaht Prenses unvanı için 101. aday!” 101 aday var, kim prens tarafından seçilecek?

---

description.vi:
Người khác xuyên, không làm công chúa thì bét nhất cũng phải làm tiểu thư lá ngọc cành vàng. Tới lượt cô thì rơi trúng nhà nghèo ở nông thôn. Nếu thế giới này là một cuốn sách thì cô nhất định sẽ chỉ là nhân vật phụ mờ nhạt. Evie Collins nghĩ rằng mình sẽ sống như vậy cả đời, cho tới khi bị vị hôn phu phản bội vì một cô tiểu thư trên thủ đô.
“Trừ hai người ra, tất cả mọi người ở đế quốc sẽ thích tôi!”
Sau lời tuyên bố đó, Evie trở thành ứng cử viên thứ 101 cho cuộc bầu chọn vị trí Thái Tử Phi!!!!! Liệu với vẻ ngoài như con trai cùng tính cách không chút nào duyên dáng, Evie có chiến thắng trong cuộc thi có một không hai này???

description.zh-hk:
「皇太子妃101開幕了！各位，為你的皇太子妃投票吧！」 在重生的世界裡開始進行一場大規模皇太子妃選拔賽，但我只是個平凡的配角，這一切都與我無關……個頭啦！我到底為什麼會變成第101位皇太子妃候選人啊？！
